label: logicA:marketing_en
steps: [1] If we run a targeted email campaign, then leads visit the product landing page.
[2] If leads visit the product landing page, then trial sign-ups increase.
[3] For every lead x, if x fits our ideal customer profile, then x clicks the personalized CTA.
[4] Lead a fits our ideal customer profile.
[5] We run a targeted email campaign.
[6] Leads visit the product landing page (from [1] and [5]).
[8] Lead a clicks the personalized CTA (from [3] and [4]).
[9] Trial sign-ups increase and lead a clicks the personalized CTA (from [7] and [8]).
